StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRequestsForApplicant]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @NwaGUID uniqueiden..er = null, @FirstName varchar(20) = null, @LastName varchar(20) = null, @SSN varchar(9) = null ) AS
SELECT [ID], a.[NWA_GUID], a.FIRST_NAME, a.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, a.LAST_NAME, a.SUFFIX_CD, [RequestTypeID], [FormID], [RequestDate], [RequestStatusID], [RequestLevelID], [OSS_RequestDecisionID], [RS_RequestDecisionID], [District_RequestDecisionID], [Region_RequestDecisionID], [MCRC_RequestDecisionID], [LastEditDate], [LastEditBy], [ProgramID], [GradDate], [CommissionDate], [ReferenceText] FROM [ACP].[vwRequests] r INNER JOIN [ACP].[ext_MCRISS_O.cerContracts] a ON a.NWA_GUID = r.NWA_GUID WHERE (@NwaGUID is null OR r.NWA_GUID = @NwaGUID) AND (@FirstName is null OR a.FIRST_NAME like @FirstName) AND (@LastName is null OR a.LAST_NAME like @LastName) AND (@SSN is null OR a.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER like @SSN)
